name: threejs-vite-starter
description: A starter template for Three.js with Vite

scripts.dev:kinect: concurrently "cd server && source ~/libfreenect2/build/kinect-env/bin/activate && export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=~/libfreenect2/build/lib:$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH && export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=~/libfreenect2/build/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH && python kinect_client.py" "vite --port 3000 --host"
